item.title: Parking in front garden without a dropped curb, 6th September
item.description:
Driving over the pavement to park in the front garden without a dropped curb, leaving letters on cars when someone blocks there front garden, been going on for 5 years
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 71, Newbery Road, North End, London

item.title: Fly tipping, 6th September
item.description:
Vans are driving in to how flats late at night and leaving all these things so now not only his it a fire hazard it is harder to get to the chute to put how rubbish in the bins I did report it last week but since then more has been added

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Linsey Street, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking Restriction Sign, 6th September
item.description:
On Sandford Road near to the junction with Broadway, Bexleyheath: A Parking Restriction column on the pavement has been struck by a vehicle and is now leaning. Please could the column be realigned into the ground - picture attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandford Road, Blendon, London

item.title: Flags on Lamposts, 6th September
item.description:
Flags on the lamposts are a distraction while driving, impact the lamposts proper use and have been installed without any proper health and safety tests. These are also being used by the far right to intimidate and call on others to build racial hatred.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Downbank Avenue, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road Name Plate, 6th September
item.description:
On Pickford Road at the junction with Broadway, Bexleyheath: A road name plate for Broadway has come out of the pavement and has been moved behind the road name plate for Pickford Road - please see the attached picture. Please could the road name plate for Broadway be reinstated into its correct/original position.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Road, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Burham Close, Penge, London

item.title: Illegal Posters, 6th September
item.description:
On Broadway at the junction with Pickford Road, Bexleyheath: Please could you remove two illegal posters on the pavement which are advertising driveway services as seen in the attached picture. Please also prosecute the owner of this company who continues to illegally advertise in the area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 329, Broadway, Blendon, London

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Dead fox covered in flies, 6th September
item.description:
A fox has been hit by a vehicle and members of the public have moved it on to the very start of the common next to the first house on Tewson Road. It’s covered in flies and isn’t pleasant to walk by as it’s right next to the path and eye height due to the hill.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewson Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
